entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of light snow or drizzle late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 8:31 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:31 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
